lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert. We have lost a very dear friend. We will miss your warmth, kindness, generosity and friendship. Our fond memories of you will forever be in our hearts. Sincerest condolences to Betsy, Ned, Nancy, and the entire family. Marilyn, Steve, Lauren and Josh
